data.lyric:
[ti:The Little Drummer Boy]
[ar:Andy Williams]
[al:Merry Christmas with Andy Williams]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Happy Holiday / Holiday Season - Andy Williams (安迪·威廉姆斯)
[00:03.33]Come they told me
[00:06.20]Pa rum pum pum pum
[00:10.28]A new born king to see
[00:12.58]Pa rum pum pum pum
[00:16.45]Our finest gifts we bring
[00:18.88]Pa rum pum pum pum
[00:22.79]To lay before the king
[00:25.26]Pa rum pum pum pum
[00:27.16]Rum pum pum pum
[00:28.72]Rum pum pum pum
[00:31.04]
[00:31.79]So to honor him
[00:34.67]Pa rum pum pum pum
[00:37.52]
[00:38.18]When we come
[00:40.70]
[00:41.40]Little baby
[00:44.10]Pa rum pum pum pum
[00:47.35]
[00:48.13]I am a poor boy too
[00:50.49]Pa rum pum pum pum
[00:53.75]
[00:54.42]I have no gift to bring
[00:56.78]Pa rum pum pum pum
[01:00.07]
[01:00.77]That's fit to give a king
[01:03.18]Pa rum pum pum pum
[01:05.11]Rum pum pum pum
[01:06.67]Rum pum pum pum
[01:09.60]Shall I play for you
[01:12.59]Pa rum pum pum pum
[01:16.01]On my drum
[01:19.59]
[01:22.38]Mary nodded
[01:25.16]Pa rum pum pum pum
[01:28.94]The ox and lamb kept time
[01:31.58]Pa rum pum pum pum
[01:35.50]I played my drum for him
[01:37.91]Pa rum pum pum pum
[01:41.81]I played my best for him
[01:44.32]Pa rum pum pum pum
[01:46.29]Rum pum pum pum
[01:47.88]Rum pum pum pum
[01:51.47]
[01:54.10]Then he smiled at me
[01:57.23]Pa rum pum pum pum
[02:00.66]Me and my drum
